description.value: The house drake breathes a @Template[type:cone|distance:10] of silver mist. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.master.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. A creature that fails its save is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round. The house drake can't use Breath Weapon or Silver Infusion for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.
